title: Tangled
short_plot_summary: Rapunzel, a princess with magical hair, escapes her tower with the help of a charming thief and goes on an adventure discovering her true identity.
explanation: A princess, representing Rapunzel, the main character in the story
A lizard, symbolizing Pascal, Rapunzel's loyal and protective pet
A frying pan, representing the unconventional weapon used by Rapunzel and her allies during the adventure
A lantern, symbolizing the floating lanterns released every year to guide Rapunzel back to her family
A pair of scissors, signifying the cutting of Rapunzel's magical hair, which leads to her final discovery of her true identity
